title: Ticket #5709: test condor_q_formats
description:
condor_q commands tested:

    1) -nobatch

    2) -nobatch -run

    3) -hold (with different hold reasons)

    4) -batch (aka no command arguments)

    5) -tot

    6) -io

    7) -nobatch -dag

Yet to be tested:

    8) -globus

    9) -grid

TODO:

remove CheckOutputFormats.run from /src/condor_tests when next commits
remarks:
2016-Jul-14 14:48:14 by tim:
I removed CheckOutputFormats from the RPM packaging. I will address packaging tests in the future. The duplicate copy of CheckOutputFormats.pm was removed from condor_tests and the condor_tests/CMakeLists.txt was updated to copy CheckOutputFormats.pm from condor_scripts during the build.
